attributes.action: Make the use of cycle helmets on roads obligatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cyclists can currently only ride on roads and designated cycle paths, a £30 Penalty fine has been introduced for Cyclists who ride on the pavement in an anti social and dangerous manner to pedestrians, this law keeps the pedestrians safe, so we feel that a law is needed to keep the cyclists safe.
